Class AbstractGame

java.lang.Object
AbstractGame
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameImmigration, GameOfLife, SchellingModel
public abstract class AbstractGame extends Object
Abstract base class for different variations of Conway's Game of Life. This class manages the game grid and provides basic functionalities such as initialization, adding cells, and counting neighbors. Specific game logic is to be implemented in subclasses.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractGame

      public AbstractGame(int rows, int columns)
      Constructs an abstract Game of Life with the specified grid dimensions.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows in the game grid.
      columns - The number of columns in the game grid.

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      public Cell[][] getGrid()
      Returns the current game grid.
      Returns:
      The current state of the game grid.

    • addCell

      public void addCell(int row, int column, int state)
      Adds a cell with a specified state at the given row and column.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the cell.
      column - The column index of the cell.
      state - The initial state of the cell.

    • reInit

      public void reInit()
      Reinitializes the game grid to its initial state.

    • getNeighborCount

      public int getNeighborCount(int row, int column)
      Counts the relevant neighbors of a cell at a specified position. The definition of a relevant neighbor is determined by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index of the cell.
      column - The column index of the cell.
      Returns:
      The count of relevant neighbors.

    • isRelevantNeighbor

      public abstract boolean isRelevantNeighbor(int originRow, int originColumn, int neighborRow, int neighborColumn)
      Determines whether a neighboring cell is relevant for the current cell's next state. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define specific rules.
      Parameters:
      originRow - The row index of the original cell.
      originColumn - The column index of the original cell.
      neighborRow - The row index of the neighboring cell.
      neighborColumn - The column index of the neighboring cell.
      Returns:
      true if the neighbor is relevant, false otherwise.

    • update

      public abstract void update()
      Updates the state of the game grid. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define specific game logic.
